FuncDef: This command configures the source port for timing referenceref1orref2. If the port is unavailable or the link is down, then the reference sources are re-evaluated according to the reference order configured in theref-ordercommand.

ParaDef.Info: Identifies the physical port in the slot/mda/port, esat-id/slot/port, or pxc-id.sub-port format. Values-slot/mda/port [.channel].
